name: Machine Intelligence Community, Inc.
desc: Co-founded and led 501(c)(3) nonprofit for making education on machine intelligence accessible, effective, and innovative.

name: Machine Intelligence Conference
desc: Organized conference to give a platform for students to share their work by breaking down institutional barriers, championing diversity and connecting students to industry professionals.

name: Student communities
desc: Helped grow several student communities at Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Boston University, Harvard College, and SRM Institute for Science and Technology at Amaravati and at Kattankulathur.
